page.title: 19The Community Policeman
page.content: Our community Policeman has a beat in the King's Wood area of High Wycombe.A beat is the area that he guards.He often comes to school to see us and to tell us about dangers to look out for. His uniform is a black suit and blue shirt. He has two kinds of hat - a tall one and a flat one. The tall one is so that people can easily see him in a crowd.It is also hard so that it protects his head.The flat hat is for wearing in the car.He has a radio so that he can communicate with the police station.He has handcuffs to put round the wrists of bad people and he has a truncheon to defend himself.He carries a notebook to write down evidence so that he can remember it many months later. He told us that he is a friend to all children and we must always go to him if we need help.
